mainDishes.name: Classic Buttermilk Pancakes
mainDishes.description: Fluffy buttermilk pancakes, served with whipped butter and maple syrup.

mainDishes.description: Our classic pancakes loaded with fresh blueberries, topped with blueberry compote.

mainDishes.description: Rich chocolate chips baked into our golden pancakes, drizzled with chocolate sauce.

mainDishes.name: Belgian Waffle Wonderland
mainDishes.description: Crispy golden Belgian waffle, served with powdered sugar, whipped cream, and choice of fruit.

mainDishes.name: French Toast Fantasy
mainDishes.description: Thick-cut challah bread dipped in a sweet cinnamon batter, griddled to perfection.

mainDishes.name: Hearty Breakfast Platter
mainDishes.description: Two eggs any style, choice of bacon or sausage, breakfast potatoes, and toast.

mainDishes.name: Veggie Omelette
mainDishes.description: Three-egg omelette with spinach, mushrooms, bell peppers, onions, and cheddar cheese. Served with toast.

sides.name: Crispy Bacon
sides.description: Strips of perfectly cooked crispy bacon.

sides.name: Toast (White/Wheat/Rye)
sides.description: Two slices of your choice of toast with butter and jelly.
